fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, weave a tapestry based on three people of your choice.
- During the night, show someone your tapestry. You will learn if they like it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not include the Town (Power) in your tapestry, nor may you show it to them. Your ability will fail if you try to do either.
- Someone will like a tapestry if a majority of it is of their faction. For these purposes, "Neutral" is a faction.
- You may show each tapestry once.
- You may not self-target.
- You must show your tapestry to someone who is not part of the tapestry.
